metadata.title: CVE-2024-53620 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Article module of SPIPv4.3.3 allows authenticated attackers to execute arbitrary web scripts orHTML via injecting a crafted payload into the Title parameter.

criterions.comment: spip package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
